abstract: Goldman Sachs Group, AT&T and Cisco Systems are among stocks that Galleon hedge fund founder Raj Rajaratnam and others involved in a sprawling insider trading probe bought and sold illegally, federal prosecutors said.
snippet: Goldman Sachs Group, AT&T and Cisco Systems are among stocks that Galleon hedge fund founder Raj Rajaratnam and others involved in a sprawling insider trading probe bought and sold illegally, federal prosecutors said.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs Group, AT&T and Cisco Systems are among stocks bought and sold illegally by the Galleon Group hedge fund founder Raj Rajaratnam and others involved in a sprawling insider trading case, federal prosecutors said.

headline.main: Prosecutors Name Targets of More Galleon Trades
